title: wiki codelab broke
body:
from golang-nuts:

---
2011-01-12 release of go seems to be breaking the wiki codelab app 
(http://golang.org/doc/codelab/wiki/), due to template not being able 
to access an unexported field 

(uppercasing fields, Title/Body, both in code and html-templates, 
fixes things (at least for me)).
---

run.bash needs to build the code labs.
